ing.item: BY 26-INCHES SHEET PAN TEMPERATURE: 400 F. OVEN

directions.step:
1. PLACE ITALIAN SAUSAGE LINKS IN SINGLE LAYERS ON 4 SHEET PANS (18 BY 26 INCH). PIERCE EACH SAUSAGE. POUR 1 CUP HOT WATER OVER SAUSAGES IN EACH PAN. COVER; BAKE IN 400F. OVEN 20 MINUTES. REMOVE COVER; BAKE 15 MINUTES LONGER OR UNTIL BROWNED.
Recipe Number: L08801
SERVING SIZE: 2 SAUSAGES
From the <Army Master Recipe Index File> (actually used today!). Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
